text: Sore bakari ka fukkatsu no hi ni wa, kare-ra ni kutsujoku o atae, kare wa ōse rareyou. `Anata ga tagawa reto dōtō ni hai shita mono wa doko ni iru no ka. Sorera ni tsuite, anata gata wa (shinjinbukai hitobito to) ronsō shite itade wanai ka.' Chishiki o atae rarete ita mono wa iu. `Kyō wa, kutsujoku to kutsū ga fushin-sha no ue ni aru noda
